tool.name: tool_18

param.name: FIELDS
param.dialogReference:
Attributes

Table fields

Attributes to add. Select none to add all

param.name: ADD_LOCATION_INFO
param.dialogReference:
Add Location Info

Boolean

Default: 0

Add location information from points (x,y,(z,m))

tool.summary: Spatial join for polygons. Retrieves for each polygon the selected attributes from that point, which is contained in the polygon. In case a polygon contains more than one point, the last point wins. Optionally, the tool allows one to attach the geometrical properties (x,y(z,m)) of each point as additional attributes.
